description:
In the step to add media (photo, video, text), you can see a button to 'Add Logo' in top left corner of page, besides the button to 'Change Style'. Click on it to add the logo and its appearances.


Check out this walk-through video for using the logo feature:
description_text: In the step to add media (photo, video, text), you can see a button to 'Add Logo' in top left corner of page, besides the button to 'Change Style'. Click on it to add the logo and its appearances.     Check out this walk-through video for using the logo feature:
title: How do I add a logo to my slideshow?
